body_html: I'd prefer a non-binding approach as there are already a few extensions out there. Getting a CTC without having to compile anything seems like a nice thing to have even if it isn't as fast as the latest ultra-optimized CUDA implementation.
body_text: I'd prefer a non-binding approach as there are already a few extensions out there. Getting a CTC without having to compile anything seems like a nice thing to have even if it isn't as fast as the latest ultra-optimized CUDA implementation.
body: I'd prefer a non-binding approach as there are already a few extensions out there. Getting a CTC without having to compile anything seems like a nice thing to have even if it isn't as fast as the latest ultra-optimized CUDA implementation.
